casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Randy THOMAS. No. 365P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 11, 2008. Rufus C. Allen, Assistant Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of August 2008 by Defendant to Proceed in Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of December 2008."
